alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:10PM CDT until April 24 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
